page.title: 13THE CHILDREN OF THE VILLAGE
page.content: The children of{Higham-on-the-Hill, apart from the basic subjects at school,have sports and athletics.The older children have swimming lessons at the Leisure Centre Hinckley - transport and extra help provided by parents. Opportunities for learning music are available-a music teacher attends the school,also a peripatetic teacher of 'Brass'. Cookery is organised and supervised by parents and friends. {Religious education}includes the main Christian beliefs and worlwide beliefs.Parents may withdraw children from R.I if they so wish(1944 Ed.Act sect.25).A Sunday School is held at the Chapel. The Junior Drama Group has been successful at Drama Festivals and also joins the Adult Drama in the Christmas Pantomime.
